page.title: 06HORNSEA SCHOOLDAY - 1925
page.content: On school days we got up at 7.00am but later on Sundays.We had jobs on Saturday morning and Church services on Sunday.Our parents woke us up and we washed in the kitchen.My sister and I shared a double bed and we had home made rugs each side of the bed.Our clothes were hand made and in the Summer gingham dresses.We ate a breakfast of porridge,bacon and hot bread cakes.We walked to school and took sandwiches and ate them in the classroom.The school was at the Mereside and began with the ringing of the bell.Our lessons were Arithmetic, Geography,Drawing,and Sport.We wrote in books and used a wooden pen and metal nib to dip in the inkwell.We played cricket,racing,and football.We went to bed on dark nights at 6.00pm. Class 6.L.
